credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Restaurant Florent: Yellow Pages Telephone Book Icons
description:
Recto: Icons, randomly chosen from a New York City Yellow Pages telephone book, are evenly spaced and imprinted in black on two horizontal lines. A chair, truck and revolver appear on the top line and a Bell System bell, globe and cup, saucer and spoon setup on the bottom. Each icon is flanked above and below by lines of curved type in capital letters indicating information about the restaurant.
Verso: Blank
name: postcard
